SexualPreferences
clearPrefsClear any current set sexual preferences
setPrefSet the “like factor” for a preference
setRandomPrefsConfigure a random set of sexual preferences, according to the parameter count
getRandomLikeFactorReturn a random valid likefactor value @return
getRandomSexprefReturn a valid sexpref index @return
getPrefReturn the currently set flag score of a target preference.
removePrefUnset a previous set preference flag.
getAveragePrefScoreReturn an average score of the preferences.
getTotalPrefScoreReturn the overall running total likeFactor of a given set of preference flags.
getHighestPrefScoreReturn the highest currently set preference score from the input.
getLowestPrefScoreReturn the lowest currently set preference score from the input.

Return the currently set flag score of a target preference.  Returns 0 if the preference isn’t set

getAveragePrefScore

public function getAveragePrefScore(... args):Number

Return an average score of the preferences.  Ignores any preference that wasn’t found.

Parameters

param ... args List of flags to check against

Returns

Number bounded to the min and max likeFactor values as defined by like factor preference flags.
